description: [Rubeus](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1071) can reveal the credentials of accounts that have Kerberos pre-authentication disabled through AS-REP roasting.(Citation: GitHub Rubeus March 2023)(Citation: DFIR Ryuk's Return October 2020)(Citation: DFIR Ryuk 2 Hour Speed Run November 2020)
